issue.title: [Rust] Create build.rs to generate flatbuffers files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7642](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7642). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should take the logic from the regen.sh [1] bash script and convert it into a Rust build.rs script that can run in CI. This would require flatc to be installed to be able to build the project.

 

[1] https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/rust/arrow/regen.sh
